gist.headline: Fresh paint & audio waves
gist.blurb: We've polished the Play page with a shiny new user menu and tuned our antennae to receive audio models.
gist.summary: Frontend redesign introduces a persistent header auth menu, AI theme customization bar, and full support for audio generation models.
gist.impact: Users get a cleaner interface, easier account management, and the ability to generate audio directly from the Play page.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot renovating the interface while listening to music. Represents the UI polish (painting) and the new audio features (headphones).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot wearing headphones and painting a pixelated browser window with a lime green roller. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. UI elements like buttons and sliders floating nearby. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
